item.title: Vue Omnibar Component
item.author: james2doyle@gmail.com (James Doyle)
item.description: A Vue component that is used to create modal popups that emulate omnibar, command palette, open anywhere, or other search functions/features

item.author: james2doyle@gmail.com (James Doyle)
item.description: A Vue component that is used to create simple switches, toggles, and show/hide experiences

item.description: CrossTab syncs Vuex state across same-origin tabs. Converted from storeon crosstab

item.title: Using slots in Vue js

item.description: If you are working with server-rendered apps, using Vue slots can help you create more reusable and flexible components
